cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)

################################################################
# sample-app
#
# This script is intended to demonstrate how an application
# can be built using ugbase and cmake.
# 
# Before executing make on the files generated by this script,
# be sure to properly build ugbase as described in the readme.
################################################################

project(P_SAMPLE_APP)

# set global output paths for the sample_app
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/lib)
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/lib)
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/bin)

# This include directory is required by lib_grid.
include_directories(${P_SAMPLE_APP_SOURCE_DIR}/../ugbase)

# The path in which ug's libs are located - if they have already been built.
link_directories(${P_SAMPLE_APP_SOURCE_DIR}/../lib)

# create the executable
add_executable(sample_app src/sample_main.cpp)

# the order in which the libraries are specified is cruical!
# we're linking with libgrid and libcommon (libgrid depends on libcommon).
target_link_libraries(sample_app grid common)
